criteria.name: ORGANIZATION AND PLANNING
questions: Gives an overview or outline of the lesson or states the objectives of the lesson
Explain the relationship of the present lesson with the previous
Explains the assignment clearly
Uses audio visual ads that are clear, interesting and easy to understand

criteria.name: CONTENT AND MASTERY
questions: Does not look at his/her notes while teaching
Relates the question to practical life situations/problems or to the experiences of the students
Readily provides clear, interesting, specific examples to clarify difficult ideas/concepts/principles
Assign us to read journals, articles or to access websites from which we can learn latest information about particular lesson
Answers our questions knowledgably/satisfactory

criteria.name: COMMUNICATION SKILLS
questions: Communicates fluent in the medium of instructions, whether in English or Filipino.
Speaks in a well-modulated voice that can be heard even in the last row of our classroom
Does not commit glaring errors in grammar
Encourages us to answer by appreciating correct responses or by giving clues when we give wrong response
Use facial expressions and hand gestures effectively to emphasize a point or data

criteria.name: INSTRUCTIONAL SKILLS
questions: Asks challenging, thought-provoking questions
Distributes questions to as many as possible
Simplifies difficult concepts to our level of understanding
Arouses and sustains my interest in the lesson
Makes us participate actively in class activities
Checks whether we understand the lesson or not
Uses audio-visual aids to help us understands the lesson
Use at least two teaching strategies during a class session
Summarizes or sk us to summarize the important points of our lesson

criteria.name: RAPPORT WITH THE CLASS
questions: Appears at ease or comfortable in teaching us
Makes us feel at ease such that we are not afraid to answer nor to ask questions
Shows concern for us (Does not humiliate us nor embarrass us for wrong answers)

criteria.name: CLASSROOM MANAGEMENT
questions: Starts and ends or class on time
Comes to class prepared, we are able to finish the lesson we are supposed to cover
Sees to it that we behave properly in class

criteria.name: TECHNOLOGICAL SKILLS
questions: Maintains an engaging environment during online class
Demonstrates confidence in using applications such as Microsoft 365, and other online tools
Shows willingness to assists students with technical issues when needed during online class
Provides timely feedback of online tasks in both synchronous and asynchronous
